author: nancymarinelli
body:
This PR is to provide conversion reconstruction out of the new collection of gsfTrack which improve the lowPt efficiency. All existing conversion code has not been changed. Just configuration files have been modified/added so to clone the necessary modules. Minor changes in DataFormats/EgammaCandidates/interface/Conversion.h and DataFormats/EgammaTrackReco/interface/ConversionTrack.h  were required to include the provenance of the new collection and the associate tracks.
@bainbrid , @mverzett , @Sam-Harper
title: Conversions from low pt ele tracks released in PR =25455
